stanza.line: What potions have I drunk of Siren tearstears
Distilled from limbecks foul as hell withinwithin
Applying fears to hopes and hopes to fearsfears
Still losing when I saw my self to winwin
What wretched errors hath my heart committedcommitted
Whilst it hath thought it self so blessed nevernever
How have mine eyes out of their spheres been fittedfitted
In the distraction of this madding feverfever
O benefit of ill now I find truetrue
That better is by evil still made betterbetter
And ruined love when it is built anewanew
Grows fairer than at first more strong far greatergreater
So I return rebuked to my contentcontent
And gain by ills thrice more than I have spentspent
